Package edu.cmu.cs.prt

Class ScheduledTrip

java.lang.Object
edu.cmu.cs.prt.ScheduledTrip
public final class ScheduledTrip extends Object
Represents a scheduled trip for a route.

A trip is defined as one service (from start stop to destination stop) through a transit route in a direction.

Each stop in a trip will be associated with a scheduled arrival time and a departure time.

  • Method Details

    • direction

      public RouteDirection direction()
      Returns the direction (INBOUND or OUTBOUND) that the trip is servicing.
      Returns:
      Direction of trip

    • tripId

      public String tripId()
      Returns the unique identifier of this trip.
      Returns:
      Trip ID

    • route

      public Route route()
      Returns the route that this trip is servicing.

      For example, a trip that operates on the 61B route will return a Route instance of 61B.

      Returns:
      Route this trip belongs to

    • availableOn

      public boolean availableOn(LocalDate date)
      Returns whether this trip is available on the input date.
      Parameters:
      date - Date to check availability for
      Returns:
      True if trip is available on given date; false otherwise

    • availableOn

      public boolean availableOn(DayOfWeek dayOfWeek)
      Returns whether this trip is available on the input day of the week.
      Parameters:
      dayOfWeek - Day of the week to check availability for
      Returns:
      True if trip is available on given day of the week; false otherwise

    • startTime

      public LocalTime startTime()
      Returns the arrival time of the trip's first stop.

      Time is represented in 24 hours (00:00 to 23:59) and precise to the seconds.

      Returns:
      Arrival time of the trip's first stop

    • stops

      public List<ScheduledArrival> stops()
      Returns the scheduled stops for the trip.

      The stops are sorted based on arrival time in ascending order (from soonest to the most faraway timewise, i.e. 06:00:00 < 06:00:01).

      Returns:
      Scheduled stops for the trip

    • hasStop

      public boolean hasStop(Stop stop)
      Returns whether this trip services the input stop.
      Parameters:
      stop - Stop to check for
      Returns:
      True if this trip passes through the input stop; false otherwise

    • arrivalTimeAt

      public Optional<LocalTime> arrivalTimeAt(Stop stop)
      Returns the time at which this trip arrives at the input stop, if applicable.

      If this trip doesn't service the input stop, Optional.empty() will be returned.

      Parameters:
      stop - Stop to check for
      Returns:
      Time at which this trip arrives at the input stop

      public String toString()
